data.title: Here's a Complete Timeline of Kris Jenner and Corey Gamble's Relationship
data.meta_description: From their red carpet debut to their most recent date night, here‚Äôs a complete timeline of Kris Jenner and Corey Gamble's relationship.
data.text:
The Kardashian/Jenner name has been well known for years, starting way before Keeping Up with the Kardashians, believe it or not. Many of us can list off all of the K-J exes and current BFs, but not many people know much about queen momager Kris Jenner‚Äôs relationship with her boyfriend Corey Gamble. The two began dating in 2014 and have been together ever since. Corey works as a business executive and talent manager. When he met Kris, and at the start of their relationship, he was employed by Scooter Braun as Justin Bieber's tour manager (iconic). Wondering how these two met? Here's a complete timeline of Kris Jenner and Corey Gamble's relationship.

April 24, 2023: Kris Jenner and Corey Gamble attend a Lakers game with Kim K and her son Saint

The couple watched the Los Angeles Lakers v. Memphis Grizzlies game with Kim Kardashian and her son Saint.

November 18, 2022: Kris Jenner makes first ever holiday card with Corey Gamble

The Kardashian/Jenners are known for their infamous Christmas cards (or should we say Krismas Kards?). This year, Kris posted her 2022 holiday card to Insta, which for the first time featured her BF Corey. "Happy holidays xoxo Kris and Corey" the card said in tiny gold font.

"You guys know I LIVE for the holidays! This year, @coreygamble and I made our first-ever holiday card together with @Shutterfly and we love how they came out," she captioned the post.

September 8, 2022: Kris Jenner calls Corey Gamble 'husband material'

Kris Jenner made an appearance on The Late Late Show with James Corden alongside Kylie Jenner, and they played a game called Late Late Lie Detector, where Kris had to answer questions while hooked up to a lie detector device. One of the questions James asked her was, 'is Corey husband material?'

"Yes, he is. He's the best," Kris answered, which the lie detector determined to be a truth.

"Thank God! I'm sweating," she laughed.

July 15, 2022: Kris Jenner says Corey Gamble is 'really supportive' and 'an amazing guy'

In an interview with PEOPLE, Kris revealed how Corey has helped her throughout her career.

"I think Corey is super. He's an amazing guy. He's really supportive and he's really dialed into a lot of the different things," she said. "He's very knowledgeable about a lot of the things that I work on, and he really helps me in trying to think through some of the decisions that I make. He's such a great person to bounce things off of. I really love his point of view on things."

Kris continued, saying, "Corey's really great with people and helping me navigate a huge team and all the things that are happening. Everybody needs somebody to sort of run something by and help make decisions about the littlest things. It could be a travel, or it could be what you're doing that evening, or it could be what's going on at the office today. But it's really great to have him."

February 14, 2022: Kris Jenner and Corey Gamble host a Valentine's Day dinner together

On Valentine's Day, Kris and Corey hosted a dinner together for their friend Kym Douglas, who had recently lost her husband. In a post made a year later, Kym wrote, "Last year at this time it was going to be my first Valentine's day alone in a very long time after going through the passing of my husband. My friends Kris, Corey, Tammy and Lori saw to it that I didn't spend it alone. Cut to a year later and reframing this holiday to "GALENTINE Day" surrounded by friends and treats and joy. I realized that love comes in all different kinds of forms and they all can be celebrated we just need to embrace the love that comes our way. ‚ù§Ô∏è"

November 10, 2021: Kris Jenner posts a sweet birthday tribute for Corey Gamble

For Corey's 41st birthday, Kris made a sweet post about how much she loves him.

"Happy birthday to my love @coreygamble !! You are the most amazing partner, best friend, confidant, travel aficionado, therapist, problem solver, gold buddy, protector, advisor, and the best, most wonderful man to my kids and my grandkids!!! You are such a special part of my heart and soul and I love you so very much babe... thank you for all you are in my life!! I am truly blessed .... ‚ù§Ô∏èüôèüòçü•∞," she wrote.

November 5, 2022: Corey Gamble calls Kris Jenner his 'beautiful queen' in adorable birthday message

For Kris' 66th b-day, Corey posted on Insta calling her his 'beautiful queen' ü•π.

"Happpppppy Birthday my Beautiful Queen! Love you Deep bab. Cheers To the best mother & more decades of Love and good health with u @krisjenner ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è," he wrote in the caption.

June 2022: Kris Jenner confirms she did not get 'secretly married' to Corey Gamble

In an episode of The Kardashians, Kris finally confirmed that she didn't get 'secretly married' to Corey.

"You think I would get married and not have a big ass party?" she joked.

She also gushed about Corey to Khlo√©, saying "He's been so amazing moving into the house because he really handles everything. I love that side of him because he is always really protective."

March 23, 2021: Kris Jenner calls Corey Gamble her 'support system'

In an interview with WSJ. Magazine, Kris spilled about just how much Corey means to her, and how much he is loved by her family.

"He's the greatest guy, and he's just an amazing support system for me, and he really gives me a lot of strength and insight," she said. "He's a great sounding board. And he loves my kids and my mom, and they love him."

January 2020: Kris Jenner and Corey Gamble adopt a puppy together

Omg, so cute! ü•π Kris and Corey adopted a puppy together! The couple got their sweet pup, who they named Bridgette, from the Wagmor Pet Hotel and Spa. On an episode of KUWTK, Corey later spilled that he would do all the work in taking care of Bridgette.

"Kris is the one that wanted a dog, but I'm doing like 99.7% of all dog duties," he joked. "So what I think I've got to do now, is all the attention that I used to give Kris, I've got to just give it all to Bridgette. Maybe this could actually get her attention and she'll start giving me a little support and help on the parenting side."

November 10, 2019: Kris Jenner makes a sweet birthday post for Corey Gamble

For Corey's 39th birthday, Kris shared a sweet message to her Instagram.

"Happy Birthday @coreygamble!!! I love you babe! Thank you for holding us all down and being such a rock. You are the most amazing partner, best friend and ride or die, and I am truly blessed to have you in my life. Thank you for being on this crazy journey with me. I love you‚ù§Ô∏èüôè," she wrote.

November 5, 2018: Corey Gamble throws a party for Kris Jenner's 63rd birthday

To celebrate Kris' 63rd b-day, Corey threw her a birthday party with all her family and friends. But before that, he surprised her with cake on their IRL friend Tommy Hilfiger's private jet.

"Thank you @coreygamble for all of the birthday love and surprises!!!! #amazingday #memories #happybirthday," Kris posted to her Insta later that day.

August 2018: Kris Jenner is seen wearing a diamond ring on her ring finger

Engagement rumors started swirling around Kris and Corey when she was seen wearing a big diamond ring on her ring finger. James Corden brought up the impressive rock on The Late Late Show while playing 'Spill Your Guts or Fill Your Guts,' James asked her "Kris, you've been spotted wearing a massive diamond ring on your wedding finger. Are you and Corey Gamble engaged?"

Instead of answering the question, Kris chose to eat a cricket.

July 2018: Kris Jenner gushes about how 'great' Corey Gamble is

In an interview with US Magazine, Kris said, "He's great. Corey is so easy and, at the same time, so smart and intelligent. He's always one step ahead of me, and he loves the kids, and the kids love him, and he loves the grandchildren. He really is such a great guy."

July 2018: Kris Jenner and Corey Gamble go on a romantic baecation

Kris and Corey went on a romantic vacation together on the French Riviera where they relaxed on a yacht off the coast of Antibes. The couple was spotted by paparazzi walking hand-in-hand through the French town,

January 2018: Khlo√© Kardashian is uncomfortable about Kris Jenner's relationship with Corey Gamble

In an episode of KUWTK, Khlo√© asked Corey why he was always so withdrawn around her, expressing that she wanted to feel 'comfortable' in their relationship.

"I like all of y'all, but y'all are girls," Corey said. " I'm a dude and I know how that sh*t can go. I'm a young dude dating your mom. Y'all are not really my f*cking kids. We are technically peers." Yikes!

Before this, other Kardashian sisters also expressed their discomfort with Corey, but they eventually warmed up to him, although Khlo√©'s feelings remained the same for years.

October 23, 2017: Kim Kardashian starts breakup rumors between Kris Jenner and Corey Gamble

üò¨ Kim Kardashian may have single handedly spread a rumor on the internet that her mom and Corey broke up. Kim posted a pic of Kris to her Insta and captioned it, "Caption this.... mine is SWF," which stands for 'Single White Female.' Kim quickly deleted the second half of her caption, maybe after seeing all the comments speculating that Kris and Corey split.

February 2017: Kris Jenner reveals there aren't plans between her and Corey Gamble to get married

Three years into their relationship, Kris revealed on The Ellen Show that she and Corey didn't have any plans of getting married.

"You know, I've done that twice, and it didn't work out so well. So, I don't know. You never know. I just think as long as things are going so well, why ruffle it up?" she said.

May 2, 2016: Kris Jenner and Corey Gamble make their red carpet debut at the Met Gala

Kris and Corey made their red carpet debut at arguably the most iconic and prestigious red carpet event of them all ‚Äî the Met Gala. The couple looked incredible in their coordinating black ensembles.

April 23, 2015: Kris Jenner and Corey Gamble make things IG official

The O.G. hard launch. Kris and Corey made their first IG post together on a double date with Billy Ray Cyrus and his now-ex wife Tish.

March 22, 2015: Corey Gamble makes his Keeping Up with the Kardashians debut

You *know* it's official when a Kardashian/Jenner boyfriend finally appears on Keeping Up with the Kardashians. Corey made his debut on March 22, 2015.

In the episode, the Kardashian sisters expressed their discomfort with the age difference between their mom and her boyfriend. Kris and Corey have a 25-year age gap, making him younger than both Kim and Kourtney.

"It's creepy," Khlo√© said about their relationship.

Kim also felt that Kris might have been rushing into things.

"I'm worried about mom a little bit. She doesn't listen to me when I'm like, 'You know, you should really take it slow.' I just hope that my mom really thinks things through because I don't want her to rush into anything," she said.

November 9, 2014: Kris Jenner and Corey Gamble attend French Montana and Mohamed Hadid's birthday party

The suspected love birds attended French Montana and Mohamed Hadid's birthday party together, and were photographed standing close together with a romantic, candlelit backdrop.

Also in attendance were Kim, Khlo√©, and Kylie.

November 2014: Kris Jenner celebrates her 59th birthday in Mexico with Corey Gamble

Just before her 59th birthday, Kris and Corey jetted to Mexico to celebrate. Once they returned from paradise to LA, the rumored couple was spotted by paparazzi packin' on the PDA as they unloaded their suitcases. Kris and Corey also spent her actual birthday together on November 5th, where they were photographed together at 1OAK nightclub in Las Vegas.

October 2014: Kris Jenner and Corey Gamble attend a music festival together

Although the two still haven't spoken on their relationship status, Kris and Corey were spotted at the Life Is Beautiful music festival in Las Vegas. In an Instagram post shared by Kim that has since been deleted, Kris and Corey were photographed cozied up together while watching Kanye perform at the festival. Afterwards, the two attended Kim's 34th b-day bash.

October 2014: Kris Jenner and Corey Gamble are seen at dinner together

Pics taken by a fan began circulating of Kris and Corey out to dinner together. Blogger Sandra Rose reached out to Corey via email asking about the pics and their relationship.

"I don't know how anyone had those pics because no one was seated across from us. That worries me and I'm hoping it's not a setup from Kris because I do really like her," Corey wrote. "I would like to see this relationship take its course on a deeper level."

"I also want to make sure I'm not just a ploy for ratings because you never know."

September 2014: Kris Jenner files for Divorce from Caitlyn Jenner

11 months after announcing their split, Kris filed for divorce from Caitlyn.

"They both did it together. It's all done and [there's no drama or messiness. They worked out all details over the last few months," a source close to the Kardashian/Jenner family said, according to PEOPLE.

August 2014: Kris Jenner and Corey Gamble meet

Kris and Corey met at their mutual friend Riccardo Tisci's 4oth birthday party in Ibiza. At the time, Kris was separated to Caitlyn, but they were still married. Corey worked as Justin Bieber's tour manager.

June 2013: Kris Jenner and Caitlyn Jenner split

After 22 years of marriage, Kris and Caitlyn split, although they didn't publicly announce it until four months later in October.

"We are living separately and we are much happier this way, but we will always have much love and respect for each other. Even though we are separated, we will always remain best friends and, as always, our family will remain our number one priority," they told E! News in a joint statement.
